data.title: Redeem Retail Offers
data.meta_description: Purchased a Samsung product with a promotional offer at a retail location? Redeem your promotional offer here.
data.text:
Valid Submission Dates: 5/16/2024 - 10/8/2024

Purchase any two (2) qualifying Samsung Appliances and receive a Samsung Prepaid Mastercard® in the amount of $100. Purchase three (3) qualifying Samsung Appliances and receive a Samsung Prepaid Mastercard® in the amount of $250. Purchase four (4) or more appliances and receive a Samsung Prepaid Mastercard® in the amount of $500. If an eligible Bespoke Refrigerator is included in the Qualifying Purchase, then the applicable amount will be increased by $100. Terms and Conditions apply

Valid Submission Dates: 11/30/2023 – 4/02/2024

Receive a Samsung Prepaid Mastercard in the amount of $100 when you purchase any two (2) qualifying Samsung appliances, $300 when you purchase any three (3) qualifying Samsung appliances, $500 when you purchase any four (4) or more qualifying Samsung appliances. Terms and Conditions apply.

Valid Submission Dates: 11/01/2023 - 2/27/2024

Receive a Samsung Prepaid Mastercard in the amount of $100 when you purchase any two (2) qualifying Samsung appliances, $300 when you purchase any three (3) qualifying Samsung appliances, $500 when you purchase any four (4) or more qualifying Samsung appliances. Terms and Conditions apply.

Valid Submission Dates: 8/1/2023 – 1/29/2024

Receive a Samsung Prepaid Mastercard in the amount of $75 when you purchase any two (2) qualifying Samsung appliances, $200 when you purchase any three (3) qualifying Samsung appliances, $350 when you purchase any four (4) or more qualifying Samsung appliances, $450 when you purchase any five (5) qualifying Samsung appliances, or $600 when you purchase any six (6) qualifying Samsung appliances. Plus receive a $75 Samsung Prepaid Mastercard when you purchase an eligible Bespoke Refrigerator. Terms and conditions apply.

Valid submission Dates: 7/13/23 - 1/29/24

Receive a Samsung Prepaid Mastercard in the amount of $75 when you purchase any two (2) qualifying Samsung appliances, $200 when you purchase any three (3) qualifying Samsung appliances, $350 when you purchase any four (4) or more qualifying Samsung appliances. Terms and conditions apply.

Valid Submission Dates: 8/25/2022 – 1/30/2023

Receive a Samsung Prepaid Mastercard in the amount of up to 10% of the purchase price (pre-tax) when you purchase either three (3) or more Samsung appliances from eligible categories, or spend at least $2,999 pre-tax.

Get a storage upgrade and case on us.

With Galaxy Z Fold4, purchase 256GB and get 512GB; for Z Flip4, purchase 128GB and get 256GB. Plus, for Galaxy Z Fold4, get a Silicone Standing Cover with S Pen on us; for Z Flip4, get your choice of a Silicone Ring Case or Silicone Strap Case.

Valid Submission Dates: 3/22/22 – 9/19/22

Purchase two (2) or more eligible Samsung products from eligible categories that include Mobile & Wearables (Smartphones, Watches, Tablets), Home Entertainment (TV), Home Appliance (Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Range, Cooktop, Wall Ovens, Jet Stick Vacuums) or Computing (Laptops, Monitors) from a participating retailer in-store or online and receive a Samsung Prepaid Mastercard® in the amount of 10% off the pre-tax purchase price of the product. All purchases must include products from two (2) or more different product categories. See Terms and Conditions for list of eligible products. Available at all participating authorized retailers. Purchases from Samsung.com will not receive the 10% off.

Valid Submission Dates: 1/6/22 – 5/31/22

Receive a Samsung Prepaid Mastercard® in the amount of 10% of the pre-tax purchase price, if you purchase three (3) or more Samsung products from eligible categories listed in the Terms and Conditions, or four (4) or more Samsung products from eligible categories listed in the Terms and Conditions if you purchased from Wayfair.

Valid Submission Dates: 11/3/21 – 3/1/22

Receive a Samsung Prepaid Mastercard® in the amount of 10% of the pre-tax purchase price, if you purchase three (3) or more Samsung products from eligible categories listed in the Terms and Conditions.

Valid Submission Dates: 9/20/21 – 3/21/22

Purchase two (2) or more eligible Samsung products from eligible categories that include Phones & Wearables, Home Entertainment (TV, Sound Bar), Home Appliance (Dishwasher, Laundry, Refrigerator, Range), or Computing (Tablets/PC, Monitors, Memory) (see Appendix in the Terms & Conditions for list of eligible products) from a participating retailer and receive a Samsung Prepaid Mastercard® in the amount of 10% off the pre-tax purchase price of the product. All purchases must include products from two (2) or more different product categories. Terms and conditions apply.

Valid Submission Dates: 9/16/21 – 1/31/21

Purchase a qualifying Samsung Washer and Dryer pair with a Samsung Jet Stick Vacuum (see full terms for eligible products) from a participating retailer and receive either a $150 or $200 Samsung Prepaid Mastercard® after submitting a valid claim form. All purchases must occur in the same transaction, be on the same receipt. Terms and conditions apply.

BrandSmart Purchase Dates: 8/23/21- 10/20/21

Valid Submission Dates: 8/26/21 – 4/18/22

Purchase three (3) or more Samsung products from eligible categories.) in the same transaction that include Refrigerators, Ranges, Dishwashers,Wall Ovens, Cooktops, Range Hoods, Air Dressers, Washers, Dryers, Freezers, Vacuums and Pedestals, over the range microwaves and air purifiers from a participating retailer and receive a Samsung Prepaid Mastercard® in the amount of 10% off the pre-taxpurchase price. 41

If you’re interested in our Laundry and Vacuum bundle offer please register here.

BrandsMart Purchase Dates: 6/21/21 – 7/14/21

Valid Submission Period: 6/23/21 – 12/31/21

Purchase 4 or more eligible Samsung kitchen appliances from eligible categories and receive a Samsung Prepaid Mastercard® for 10% off of the pre-tax purchase price. Offer is subject to submission of a valid receipt and valid offer claim form. See Terms and Conditions.35

Valid Submission Period: 6/14/20 - 1/1/2022

Get an extra 10% off when you buy 2 or more eligible products from 2 or more eligible categories listed in the Terms and Conditions from Samsung.com or the Shop Samsung App during Discover Samsung.33

Valid Submission Period: 4/22/21 - 7/27/21

Receive a reimbursement up to $30 to haul away your old appliance awarded either at the register upon checkout or via a Samsung Prepaid Mastercard® if you purchase at least one (1) eligible Samsung Energy STAR Front Load Washer, Energy STAR Front Load Dryer, or Energy STAR French Door Refrigerator.³⁰
